translations: n.[昆] 蝶蛹；虫茧；准备期

sentences.sentence: It's a pattern repeated when he quit his degree to work for independent music publisher Chrysalis.
sentences.translation: 他故伎重演，放弃自己学位转投独立音乐发行商 Chrysalis。

sentences.sentence: There's a story about a man so eager to "help" a butterfly into the world that he opens its chrysalis too soon.
sentences.translation: 有个故事说，一个人太急于“帮助”一只蝴蝶来到世界，就很早地打开了它的茧。

sentences.sentence: If the butterfly doesn't struggle to get out of the chrysalis, it can't fly!
sentences.translation: 如果蝴蝶不挣扎着破茧而出，它就飞不起来！
